title: Lohengrin - Richard Wagner - Nelsson - Friedrich - Bayreuth - Ho
description:
Director: GÃƒÂ¶tz Friedrich. Bayreuth Festival (1979). Cast: Peter Hofmann (Lohengrin), Karan Armstrong (Elsa), Elizabeth Connell (Ortrud), Leif Roar (Telramund), Siegfried Vogel (Heinrich). Conductor: Woldemar Nelsson

A great traditional(ish) Bayreuth production of Richard Wagner's Lohengrin; just don't ask where it comes from.

The sound has been passed through from the DVD (DTS 5 channel). The video was converted to an mkv (H.264 at 22.5 [RF] quality).

English, French and German srt subtitles are included.

I also include a bonus audio track.
